quoteLast: the Twelfth Flotilla, farther north, sighted six Kaiser battleships and attacked them.  Captain Stirling, in the _Faulkner_, torpedoed one, and some time later Commander Champion, in the _Nomad_, hit another; but the Germans claim that both the wounded ships reached port.
title: Days to Remember: The British Empire in the Great War
author: Buchan, John, 1875-1940; Newbolt, Henry John, Sir, 1862-1938
